name: Perfect & Practical Boston Rental (1,000+ sqft)
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood truly has it all.  Good, not overpriced restaurants and a variety of food.  Everything you need (groceries, zipcar, alcohol, etc.) is within a mile.  It's ideally close to the city center but in a quiet residential area.  My guests tell me they feel like they are "home" when they stay here.
description:
This is a cozy and spacious 2-3 bedroom unit with everything you need to make your stay a comfortable one. A true "home away from home." If available, combine with adjacent one bedroom unit (separate listing) for additional space.

The space
Perfect apartment rental for those in town visiting Boston and/or family and friends in the area. Very comfortable, cozy, and convenient.

* Open and airy with lots of windows and light
* Comfortable living room and spacious dining room
* Gumwood architectural period detail and character
* Kitchen w/gas stove and island seating, and all the supplies and appliances you need
* Hardwood oak floors throughout
* Shared porch and backyard with patio (dining table and lounge furniture)
* Laundry
* Driveway parking (negotiable) for 3 vehicles and plenty on street parking (no permits required)

It's ideally close to the city center but in a quiet residential area.  My guests tell me they feel like they are "home" when they stay here.
description:
This is a cozy yet spacious one bedroom unit with everything you need to make your stay a comfortable one!

The space
Private one bedroom apartment which sits on the border of the great Boston neighborhoods of Roslindale and West Roxbury. Has everything you need to make your short or medium term stay comfortable, convenient, and affordable! Rents by the day, week, and month. Approximately 550 sqft of fully furnished top floor living space including a spacious bedroom, large living room, new bathroom, efficiency kitchen (no oven) and eating area. Private entrance. Access to shared back porch, grilling area and backyard. WiFi and internet cable included.

Note: This unit is 5-6 miles outside of downtown so please take location into consideration before you book. Please see note below regarding public transportation.

name: Practical Comfort - 2,800+ sqft in Boston
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood truly has it all.  Good, not overpriced restaurants and a variety of food.  Everything you need (groceries, zipcar, alcohol, etc.) is within a mile.  It's ideally close to the city center but in a quiet residential area.  My guests tell me they feel like they are "home" when they stay here.
description:
2,800+ sqft of living space + porch/patio. 7 minute walk to Bellevue stop on the Needham commuter rail line - right into downtown for the action! All updated and/or restored over the past several years. I've rented two of the three units which make up this house since 2013 so please see those guest reviews to get a better idea of the quality and comfort of the property.

https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/849408?
https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/962610?

The space
Perfect full house rental for any number of occasions. Very comfortable, cozy, and convenient.

* Open and airy with lots of windows and light
* Three living rooms and two dining rooms
* Gumwood architectural period detail and character
* Fully stocked with kitchen supplies and appliances
* Refinished hardwood oak floors throughout
* Two porches (grill, bistro table, tv) and backyard with patio (dining table and lounge furniture)
* Laundry (basement)
